cta.description: Let's collaborate to build something exceptional. I'm ready to partner with you to transform your ideas into impactful solutions. Together, we can create technology that drives real progress.

footer.builtWith: Built with Nuxt UI • © {year} Muhammad Rheza Alfin

journey.description: From inventory control to cloud infrastructure - every step has built who I am today.

lead.title: Software Development Team Lead
lead.description: Leading the software development team, managing project timelines, and overseeing the delivery of enterprise solutions.

dev.title: Full-stack Developer
dev.description: Developed and maintained full-stack applications using Laravel, Vue.js, and Docker.

dev.title: Full-stack Developer
dev.description: Built comprehensive e-commerce and POS systems, managing the full development lifecycle.

sales.title: Head Of Sales Operations
sales.description: Managed sales operations, optimized processes, and oversaw team performance.

supervisor.title: Inventory Control Supervisor
supervisor.description: Supervised inventory control operations, ensuring accuracy and efficiency in stock management.

analyst.title: Inventory Control Analyst
analyst.description: Analyzed inventory data to identify trends, discrepancies, and opportunities for improvement.

clerk.title: Inventory Control Clerk
clerk.description: Performed daily inventory checks and maintained accurate stock records.

home.description: Full-stack Developer & IT Consultant specializing in performance tuning, system integration, and automation. I combine business operations knowledge with technology to deliver solutions that improve real-world processes.

transformation.description: Nearly a decade in retail operations taught me to think analytically, pay attention to detail, and focus on preventing errors and inefficiencies. Today, I apply these same principles to software development.

analytical.title: Analytical Thinking
analytical.description: Trained through years of investigating irregularities and operational misuse at Indomaret Group. I approach every problem systematically, identifying root causes and implementing preventive solutions.

detail.title: Attention to Detail
detail.description: From managing inventory accuracy across multiple stores to writing clean, maintainable code - precision matters. Every line of code, every configuration, every deployment is carefully considered.

improvement.title: Process Improvement
improvement.description: Whether optimizing stock reporting workflows or architecting scalable systems, I'm driven by efficiency. I believe technology should solve real problems and improve real processes.

expertise.description: Building modern, scalable solutions with a focus on performance, maintainability, and real-world impact.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Laravel and NestJS frameworks with PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Redis for robust, high-performance applications.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Vue.js, Nuxt, and Next.js for building clean, reactive user interfaces with modern JavaScript best practices.

performance.title: Performance Optimization
performance.description: Leveraging Soketi, Octane, and Redis for real-time features and blazing-fast response times.

devops.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
devops.description: Docker, Nginx, Kong, HAProxy, and Patroni for scalable, reliable deployments and high availability.

integration.title: Enterprise Integration
integration.description: ERP systems integration with Odoo, building bridges between business operations and technology.

leadership.title: Team Leadership
leadership.description: Leading development teams, mentoring developers, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and excellence.

projects.description: A comprehensive list of projects I have delivered, ranging from enterprise resource planning to specialized dashboards and e-commerce platforms.

ids_starter.title: IDS Starter Kit
ids_starter.description: The FullStack Application Starter Kit utilizes the Laravel framework, VueJS, UI Kit, and is Docker-friendly. This comprehensive starter kit provides developers with a solid foundation to kickstart full-stack application development.

sakti.title: Sistem Absensi dan Laporan Terintegrasi (Sakti)
sakti.description: Designed for PT Pesonna Optima Jasa to manage employee attendance records, utilizing technologies like DeepFace for facial recognition to ensure accurate clock-in/out procedures and generating integrated reports.

folur.title: Folur Global Platform
folur.description: The Food Systems, Land Use, and Restoration (FOLUR) initiative aims to transform agricultural practices and land use to support sustainability, food security, and the restoration of agricultural lands across 27 countries.

tekmira.title: tekMIRA-Uji Profisiensi
tekmira.description: Proficiency testing program to evaluate the performance of participant laboratories in testing coal, coal ash, laterite nickel minerals, bauxite, and iron ore, ensuring compliance with ISO 17025 standards.

malaria.title: Malaria Website with Drupal 9.5
malaria.description: Developed for UNDP HEART Program to support national efforts in addressing health inequality. Focuses on strengthening the Global Fund for AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria (GFATM) Country Coordinating Mechanisms.

slide_babel.title: Slide Babel - Sistem Informasi Perikanan
slide_babel.description: Fisheries information services platform providing data on Fish Price, Availability, Cultivated Fish Types, Marketing Locations, and Cold Storage Facilities for the Marine and Fisheries Service of Bangka Belitung Province.

rabbani.title: Rabbani Web Commerce
rabbani.description: E-commerce platform specializing in Islamic-based products. Designed to provide a convenient and secure shopping experience with features aligning with Islamic values and ethical production practices.

clove.title: Clove Analytics Dashboard
clove.description: Website Analytic Tool for Clove statistical Research. Features User/Role Management, Subscription Management, and specific statistical modules like Significant Test, Proportion Test, and Brand Maps.

koni_atlet.title: Koni Jabar Atlet Management
koni_atlet.description: Platform integrating athlete data, training programs, and sports achievements in West Java. A comprehensive source of information for tracking athletes and coaching programs.

starsender.title: Starsender Plugin for WHMCS
starsender.description: Seamless integration of WhatsApp API into the WHMCS platform. Enables sending WhatsApp messages directly from the WHMCS dashboard for efficient client communication.

favori.title: Favori App V2
favori.description: Information system dashboard for Inacookies internal use. Allows monitoring of sales data, production metrics, inventory levels, and customer feedback with real-time visualization.

mtre3.title: MTRE3 Insentif Surya Atap
mtre3.description: Online platform for Roof Solar Power Incentive (PLTS Atap), provided by the Sustainable Energy Fund (SEF) under the MTRE3 project (UNDP & Govt of Indonesia).

koni_dashboard.title: Koni Jabar Dashboard
koni_dashboard.description: Dashboard for West Java Sports Resource Data Center. Provides interactive visualizations regarding athletes, training programs, and sporting achievements.

koni_website.title: Koni Jabar Website
koni_website.description: Maintenance, feature enhancements, and bug fixing for the Koni Jabar website to ensure optimal performance and improved user experience.

frozen_food.title: Frozen Food Dashboard & E-Commerce
frozen_food.description: Comprehensive system combining e-commerce, warehousing, purchasing, and stocktaking capabilities. Streamlines operations and manages inventory for frozen food retail.

undss.title: UNDSS Dashboard
undss.description: Bug fixing and new feature development for UNDSS Dashboard. Processes incident data into a centralized bank for spatial analysis and risk management.

zafaa.title: Zafaa POS
zafaa.description: Specialized POS application for frozen food retail. Features stock monitoring, card payment integration, and customer management to improve retail efficiency.

projectsPage.title: Featured Projects
projectsPage.description: A comprehensive list of projects I have delivered, ranging from enterprise resource planning to specialized dashboards and e-commerce platforms.

journeyPage.title: Professional Journey
journeyPage.description: A timeline of my career path, key roles, and significant milestones.

servicesPage.title: ERP Implementation Services
servicesPage.description: Comprehensive ERP solutions tailored to your business needs.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Streamline financial operations with integrated invoicing, bill payments, and comprehensive accounting reports. Automate reconciliation and ensure financial compliance.

supplyChain.title: Supply Chain
supplyChain.description: Optimize inventory flows with integrated procurement and sales. Manage stock levels, automate replenishment, and track product movements across warehouses.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: Manage complete production lifecycles with Bill of Materials (BOMs) and Work Orders. Integrate manufacturing with inventory and procurement for just-in-time efficiency.

ecommerce.title: Supply Chain & Ecommerce
ecommerce.description: Unify online and offline sales with a fully integrated e-commerce platform. Sync inventory in real-time, manage shipping, and accept online payments seamlessly.

hr.title: Human Resources
hr.description: Centralize employee management from recruitment to payroll. Track attendance, manage leave requests, and automate payroll processing with local regulation compliance.

website.title: Website Company
website.description: Build a professional, responsive corporate website with an easy-to-use drag-and-drop builder. Showcase services and manage content without coding.

elearning.title: E-Learning
elearning.description: Create engaging online courses and certifications. Manage student progress, quizzes, and content delivery through a dedicated Learning Management System (LMS).

project.title: Project Management
project.description: Plan and track projects with tasks, timesheets, and milestones. Integrate with sales and billing to manage project profitability and resource allocation.

custom.title: Custom Modul Development
custom.description: Tailored Odoo module development to meet specific business requirements that standard modules cannot cover. Includes API integrations and workflow automation.

training.title: User Training
training.description: Comprehensive training sessions for administrators and end-users. Includes documentation, hands-on workshops, and best practice guidelines for efficient system usage.
